DOC.brief_title: Ketorolac Versus Triamcinolone Knee Injections Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: Subject Population : Adult patient , age 18-90 year old satisfy inclusion criterion meet exclusion criterion enrol Orthopaedics Clinic San Antonio Military Medical Center ( SAMMC ) . The enrollment period study two year , patient recruit 44 enrollee allow 36 completers . Patients stratify base gender age ( < 65 > = 65 year old ) . Demographics obtain age , gender , height , weight , laterality body-mass index ( BMI ) . Randomization : This predetermine computerized randomization schedule identify treatment , ketorolac tromethamine versus triamcinolone acetonide . A patient key paper list patient name , last four digit sponsor 's social security number , study number ( randomly assign ) , treatment keep nurse/technician Orthopaedics Clinic , lock cabinet . Patients stratify gender age ( < 65 > = 65 year old ) . Subjects continue enrol least 10 gender group , treat either ketorolac tromethamine triamcinolone acetonide . In event subject bilateral knee pain , knee inject treatment medication knee randomize one include data analysis . A pharmacist prepare treatment injection Orthopaedics Clinic . Injections do 2-inch , 21-gauge needle place 10cc syringe opaque cover conceal content blind patient associate investigator treatment . Injections contain either 2cc ketorolac tromethamine ( Toradol , 15mg/cc ) 8cc bupivacaine hydrochloride ( 0.5 % ) without epinephrine 2cc triamcinolone acetonide ( Kenalog-40 , 40mg/cc ) 8cc bupivacaine hydrochloride ( 0.5 % ) without epinephrine . The subject treatment injection take Interdisciplinary Pain Management Center , injection ultrasound guidance . The subject 's select knee , bilateral knee , superolateral site , sterilely prepped standard fashion betadine allow dry , prior injection . The treatment injected associate investigator , Interdisciplinary Pain Management Center , train Physical Medicine Rehabilitation certify perform ultrasound examination . The associate investigator blind treatment outcome . A patient key list patient name , last four digit sponsor 's social security number , age , gender , patient number ( randomly assign ) treatment receive kept nurse/technician Orthopaedics Clinic research folder , lock cabinet . Radiographs obtain baseline 6 month follow-up . Osteoarthritis classify accord Kellgren-Lawrence ( K-L ) radiographic criterion associate investigator fellowship train Total Joints . K-L grading enter Case Report Form ( CRF ) prior outcome data entry . The associate investigator blind treatment . Outcome data collection perform study nurse/technician Orthopaedics Clinic , exception part Knee Society Score ( KSS ) , perform associate investigator . The nurse/technician record demographic data , include height , weight , BMI , gender , laterality age , baseline clinic visit 6 month follow-up . The use nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAID ) analgesic drug adverse event study period record visit . Patients keep diary NSAID analgesic use study . Patients follow-up 2 week , 6 week , 3 month 6 month . A visual analogue scale ( VAS ) , KSS , Western Ontario McMasters Universities ( WOMAC ) index , Short Form 36 ( SF-36 ) , University California Los Angeles ( UCLA ) Activity Score Lysholm Knee Score ( LKS ) obtain baseline clinic visit follow-up . All data obtain study record CRF . All data collect keep nurse/technician Orthopaedics Clinic research folder , lock cabinet . Data CRF enter electronic database Excel principle investigator password protect computer . The database make available associate investigator electronically . Data analysis perform principle investigator also perform password protect computer . All investigator remain blinded treatment receive , data analysis perform . There patient identifier data provide investigator , patient number . The patient number number randomly assign patient identifiable patient key , keep separate . A sample size 16 per group achieve 80 % power detect difference 1.6 ( 16mm ) VAS compare ketorolac tromethamine triamcinolone acetonide intra-articular injection estimate standard deviation 1.56 significance level ( alpha ) 0.05 . There expect drop-out rate 20 % , imply sample size 20 subject per group . Data analysis perform principle investigator associate investigator blind treatment data analysis complete .
DOC.criteria: Subject must least 18 year age old 90 year age ; either gender Radiographic evidence symptomatic osteoarthritis one bilateral knee . Osteoarthritis define pain weightbearing tibiofemoral and/or patellofemoral articulation together radiographic finding describe . At painful articulation , radiographic evidence KellgrenLawrence Grade 2 : definite osteophytes possible narrow joint cartilage associate sclerosis subchondral bone , Grade 3 : moderate multiple osteophyte , definite narrow joint space , small pseudocystic area sclerotic wall subchondral bone , possible deformity bone end , Grade 4 : large osteophyte , mark narrowing joint space , severe sclerosis alter shape bone end . Subject agree participate followup evaluation complete outcome score sheet ( postinjection , 2 week , 6 week , 3 month 6 month ) .
